title: KRL Notification 2026 - Apply Online for 02 Project Engineer, Manager Posts
description: The Kerala Rubber (KRL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Project Engineer and Manager Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed theirÂ B.E./B. Tech in Electrical Engineering, CA can apply for the KRL Notification 2026. The interested applicants can apply in online mode.
